name: Lying Windshield Wipers
description: Lying on back with arms out, rotate bent knees from side to side
form_cues: Keep shoulders flat on ground, control the motion

name: Standing Torso Rotation
description: Standing with feet shoulder-width apart, rotate torso side to side
unlock_requirements: 15 reps x 3 sets of Lying Windshield Wipers
form_cues: Rotate from the waist, keep hips facing forward

name: Russian Twist (Feet Down)
description: Seated with feet on ground, hands together, rotate torso side to side
unlock_requirements: 20 reps x 3 sets of Standing Torso Rotation

name: Russian Twist (Feet Up)
description: Russian twist with feet raised off ground
unlock_requirements: 15 reps x 3 sets of Russian Twist (Feet Down)
form_cues: Balance on sit bones, keep chest up
secondary_muscle_groups: rectus abdominis, hip flexors, lower back

name: Bicycle Crunch
description: Lying on back, alternately bring elbow to opposite knee while extending other leg
unlock_requirements: 12 reps x 3 sets of Russian Twist (Feet Up)
form_cues: Touch elbow to knee, full extension on opposite side

name: Seated Torso Rotation with Weight
description: Russian twist holding weight or medicine ball
unlock_requirements: 15 reps x 3 sets of Bicycle Crunch
form_cues: Control the weight, maintain posture throughout

name: Windshield Wipers (Knees Bent)
description: Lying on back, rotate bent knees from side to side while arms are out
unlock_requirements: 12 reps x 3 sets with 5kg of Seated Torso Rotation with Weight
form_cues: Touch knees to floor on each side, control motion
secondary_muscle_groups: rectus abdominis, hip flexors, transverse abdominis

name: Standing Cable Rotation
description: Using cable machine or resistance band, rotate torso against resistance
unlock_requirements: 10 reps x 3 sets of Windshield Wipers (Knees Bent)
form_cues: Pivot from feet, engage core throughout motion

name: Windshield Wipers (Legs Straight)
description: Lying on back with legs straight up, rotate legs side to side
unlock_requirements: 12 reps x 3 sets of Standing Cable Rotation
form_cues: Keep shoulders planted, control through full range
secondary_muscle_groups: rectus abdominis, hip flexors, lower back

name: Around the World
description: Full 360Â° rotation of legs while maintaining hollow body position
unlock_requirements: 8 reps x 3 sets of Windshield Wipers (Legs Straight)
form_cues: Maintain hollow body, smooth continuous motion
secondary_muscle_groups: obliques, hip flexors, lower back, shoulders
